title: Learn to Paint with Acrylics!
desc: You want to learn how to paint with Acrylics? Well, by the end of this tutorial, we hope you'll be able to confidently pick up a brush and paint an acrylic painting!
tips: There are 2 main methods to painting Acrylic. One which involves mixing colours directly on your palette and then applying to your canvas. The other is painting a monochromatic underpainting and, by mixing the paint with water, applying a glaze like layer of paint to build up colours.
Acrylic paint dries very quickly so prepare to work fast
Due to the fast drying nature of acrylics, layering is one of it's biggest features.
The last piece of advice I can offer is to have fun with it! Just experiment and you'll find a way that works for you!

title: How to sketch the perfect form!
desc: Sketching can be hard, for both beginner and expert artists! In this tutorial we will offer some tips to help you.
tips: Try breaking complex forms into basic shapes. Once you get into the mindset of understanding forms as a collection of shapes ontop of eachother, it can really help with setting up the compositions and poses.
Learning perspective is very important for understanding how those shapes change as they get closer or farther away from the viewer
Try to keep your sketches simple. Don't add colour yet, try not to make the lines too messy and pick poses that are easier to start off with.
Practice! Practice doesn't quite make perfect but it can get you very close. Practice will get you more familiar with techniques and understanding the forms you are creating.

title: How to download digital brushes
desc: Downloading brushes off the internet is confusing at first so let me help you figure it out! (This tutorial is for Procreate)
tips: First, find a brush you like! Brushes with different textures or line weight can be really fun to play around wtih!

Follow the link to download the brush. Sometimes people will ask you to pay a small amount for a download link for the brush. If you want to pay for it go ahead, otherwise there are plenty of free brushes out there!
Next you want to download the brush into your files and then go open it. Once you open it, it should automatically download into your procreate!
Enjoy experimenting with your new brush!

title: How to practise drawing
desc: Starting to draw can be scary and you can easily try to become a perfectionist who pays too much attention to details that don't matter. Here is some guidance that will help you as an artist in the long run
tips: Before drawing, relax, get comfy (make sure you have good posture, your back and neck will thank you later)
Prepare your tools, whether this is an array of pencils, some paints or just a piece of charcoal!
Grab an object! Still life drawing is a very good way to observe form and light.
Start with some experimental drawings. Try only looking at your object! Or try only looking at your object once. Do these in small intervals first e.g. 10-30 seconds and then move on to 1-5 minutes.
These help to teach you essential skills that will help you are you mature as an artist!
